attributes.action: Give carer's a break,And give them FREE travel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Carer's in this country are saving the government billions of pounds every year.Many are not getting any type of benefit and so do not qualify for the lower rate travel. It is very hard for carer's to be recognised for what they do. 
So we are asking for a small recognisation of FREE travel for all carer's, give them something back for all the hard work they are doing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
